DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate whether physical exercise , dietary restriction , combination , among overweight obese postpartum woman lead significantly large reduction weight longer perspective , compare similar woman receive intervention . The study also investigate effect body composition , cardiovascular fitness , blood lipid , insulin level inflammation marker . In total , 68 woman pre-pregnancy BMI 25 - 34.9 randomize 10 wk postpartum : ( 1 ) physical exercise , ( 2 ) dietary restriction , ( 3 ) physical exercise + dietary restriction ( 4 ) control group . The intervention last 12 wk longterm effect measure 1 yr trial initiation . To date study show short term ( 12 wk ) effect exist . Our study first include four intervention group , separate effect physical activity dietary restriction interaction , assess . Further , investigator estimate effect body composition take body water account estimate total energy expenditure high precision previously . Overweight obesity escalate problem Sweden . Sustainable weight reduction program urgently need . During postpartum period , woman may motivate lose weight . Information aim promote life style change among overweight obese woman could longer perspective integrated regular maternal health care Sweden .
DOC.brief_title: Short- Longterm Effects Physical Activity Dietary Restriction Postpartum
DOC.criteria: prepregnant BMI 2535 non smoking , single term birth intention breastfeed exclusively 6 mo Diseases medication mother child
